# [Interview #1135: SpoCon 2015, Entry #3](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1135#3)

#### Shardlet

In hemalurgy, does the person doing the spiking need to have Scadrian investiture?

#### Brandon Sanderson

No.

#### Question

So, anyone with the knowledge could spike someone?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Yes.

hemalurgy
